bibl.note: This document is a bill of sale dated April 29, 1813. The bill shows the sale of a negro boy, Ezekiel, to Lemuel P. Montgomery from Hugh Montgomery. The bill shows that Ezekiel is sold for $420.00.

div.p: Be it remembered that I Hugh Montgomery have this day bargained, sold and do by these presents bargain, sell, and convey to Lemuel P. Montgomery a negro boy named Ezekiel about thrirteen thirteen or fourteen years of age the same that Hugh Montgomery purchased in the State of North Carolina for and in consideration of the sum of four hundred and twenty dollars to me in hand paid the reciept receipt whereof is hereby acknowledged and I Hugh Montgomery do warrant and defend the title of said negro to the said Lemuel P. against the lawfull lawful claim or demand of any person whatever, & that said negro is sound and healthy

As witness my hand and seal this twenty ninth day of April 1813.
